message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item is truly exceptional and I believe it would greatly benefit your needs, given its value to you is estimated at $10000. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special price of $9500. This is an opportunity to acquire a high-value item at a competitive rate. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and preferences. Looking forward to your positive response.
